Class PostFacade

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.bl.facades.post.PostFacade
public class PostFacade extends Object
The PostFacade class provides a unified interface to post management operations such as creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving posts. It follows the Singleton design pattern to ensure only one instance exists.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static PostFacade getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the PostFacade. Ensures that only one instance of the PostFacade exists throughout the application.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the PostFacade.

    • createPost

      public boolean createPost(Post post)
      Creates a new post. Delegates the creation process to the DAO layer.
      Parameters:
      post - The Post object containing the post details.
      Returns:
      true if the post was created successfully, false otherwise.

    • updatePost

      public boolean updatePost(Post post)
      Updates an existing post. Delegates the update process to the DAO layer.
      Parameters:
      post - The Post object containing the updated post details.
      Returns:
      true if the post was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • deletePost

      public boolean deletePost(int postId)
      Deletes a post by its ID. Delegates the deletion process to the DAO layer.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the post was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • getPost

      public Post getPost(int postId)
      Retrieves a post by its ID. Delegates the retrieval process to the DAO layer.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Post object containing the post details.

    • getUserPosts

      public List<Post> getUserPosts(int userId)
      Retrieves all posts created by a specific user. Delegates the retrieval process to the DAO layer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose posts are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Post objects containing the user's posts.

    • getFollowersPosts

      public List<Post> getFollowersPosts(int userId)
      Retrieves all posts created by users followed by a specific user. Delegates the retrieval process to the DAO layer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose followed users' posts are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Post objects containing the followed users' posts.
